hasMenuItem.description: Thinly sliced sockeye salmon atop a small mound of hand-pressed sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.description: Chopped scallop mixed with mayonnaise and tobiko, served atop a portion of sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Albacore Tuna Maguro Nigiri Sushi

hasMenuItem.name: Scallop Hotate Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with a tender scallop, traditionally served as a single piece of nigiri sushi.

hasMenuItem.name: Yellowtail Hamachi Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Thinly sliced yellowtail placed on a small bed of hand-pressed sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Sea Bream Madai Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with a slice of sea bream, known in Japan as madai. One order includes one piece.

hasMenuItem.name: Squid Ika Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh sliced squid atop a small portion of hand-pressed sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Bluefin Red Tuna Akami Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with a slice of bluefin red tuna akami, typically includes wasabi.

hasMenuItem.name: Foie Gras Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Seared foie gras atop sushi rice, often accompanied by subtle accompaniments to enhance its rich flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg Tamago Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with a slice of sweet Japanese egg omelette.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Tofu Inari Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Fried tofu inari sushi typically includes a pouch of fried tofu filled with sushi rice, served as a single piece of nigiri.

hasMenuItem.name: Boiled Prawn Ebi Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Boiled prawn placed atop a compact bed of seasoned sushi rice, forming a single piece of nigiri sushi.

hasMenuItem.name: Stripe Jack Shima Aji Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Stripe jack (shima aji) atop a small bed of sushi rice, reflecting traditional Japanese nigiri preparation.

hasMenuItem.name: Water Eel Anago Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-pressed sushi rice topped with gently simmered water eel (anago), typically includes a touch of sweet sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Atlantic Salmon Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Sliced Atlantic salmon atop vinegared sushi rice, carefully hand-pressed into a single piece of nigiri.

hasMenuItem.name: Flying Fish Roe Tobiko Nigiri Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flying fish roe, known as tobiko, delicately placed atop hand-pressed sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.description: Five pieces of thinly sliced red sea bream, traditionally served as a delicate sashimi offering.

hasMenuItem.name: Golden Eye Snapper Kinme Sashimi (5 pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Five pieces of golden eye snapper, known as 'Kinme' in Japan, thinly sliced for a delicate sashimi experience.

hasMenuItem.description: Five pieces of sweet prawn, known as ama ebi, served raw to highlight their natural sweetness.

hasMenuItem.description: Ocean wise.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Assorted Sashimi (23 pcs)

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon & Hamachi Sashimi (8pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Four pieces of thinly sliced salmon and four pieces of hamachi, served fresh.

hasMenuItem.description: Four pieces of Atlantic salmon, thinly sliced, typically served on its own.

hasMenuItem.description: Kamei Royale signature Japanese thick noodles, fresh vegetables, prawn tempura, fish cake and poached egg.

hasMenuItem.name: Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice serves as the base, typically accompanied by a variety of toppings such as vegetables, eggs, and protein.

hasMenuItem.name: Chirashi Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Assortment of fresh seafood on sushi rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Sukiyaki Beef Udon
hasMenuItem.description: Sukiyaki beef and vegetables in Japanese noodle soup.

hasMenuItem.description: Fresh prawn coated with tempura batter served with our tempura sauce.

review.reviewBody: Very good quality and portion of fish except the uni has gone bad
Kamei Royale always supplies very high quality sushi . You can rely on them .

first time trying this restaurant - not impressed. Gyoza came cold. Some of the fish did not smell fresh; albacore tuna roll on side was lacklustre for the cost of the platter. Rice not good. Would not order again.
